author: Staff Reporter
text:
Man held for

grabbing land

A 56-year-old watchman was arrested by the Central Crime Branch wing on charges of allegedly grabbing land worth Rs. 35 lakh.

L.Sethupathi and L. Premkumar had appointed G. Mani (56) of Chromepet as security for a property measuring 3,250 sq ft in Lashmipuram, Chromepet. Years later it was later found that he had created fake documents and also executed a sale deed in his wife’s name.

Mr. Sethupathi produced documents to substantiate his claim and investigations revealed Mani had created fake documents. He was arrested and produced in a court in Alandur. He was lodged in Puzhal prison. — Staff Reporter
title: Man held for land-grabbing
